title: Biden Set a Trap | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Rep. Thomas Massie | 4/29/21
description:
Joe Biden’s first speech to Congress was a well-crafted trap that we need to pay attention to. Glenn breaks down what Biden set up and why his real message was chilling. Rep. Thomas Massie calls in to discuss how schizophrenic and radical Biden’s address was and the future of a Biden economy. Is the computer chip shortage dire? Bill O’Reilly joins a day early to comb through all the unrealistic things President Biden proposed in his speech. Economist Stephen Moore shares his insight on Biden’s atrocious spending proposals and the massive inflation they’ll cause. Glenn and Stu review some companies that are refusing to take a political side.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
